dct_title_s: Survey of plot 2 & parts of plots 1, 4, 5 & 6, block 460 together with lots 1 to 30, inclusive, block 460a, tax assessment map, township of North Bergen, Hudson County, N.J.
dct_description_sm: Tax assessment map delineating Bellman's Creek through properties on Block 460 in North Bergen Township, New Jersey
Source map supplied by New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Note on map states "Part of the northerly and part of the easterly boundary of the property surveyed are fixed by the monumentation of a certain map entitled Map No. 1"
